duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead day to day back-office operations with fellow clinical staff
Support providers in office with back-office responsibilities including rooming patients, documentation, procedures, injections, blood draws and more
Flexible, team player, willing to step in and help when needed
Additional responsibilities include checking in patients telephonically, processing medication refills, sending out lab/x-ray results, and processing referrals for more specialized care

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent education (Ex: GED, verification of homeschool equivalency, partial or full completion of post-secondary education, etc.)
5+ years of medical assistant experience with highly complex, chronic disease management or in a specialty discipline
Certified or registered Medical Assistant through an approved credentialing agency
American Heart Association Basic Life Support (BLS)
